name: GKDecisionNode
desc: A node for use in manually creating decision trees, representing a specific question and possible answers, or an action that follows from answering other questions.

items.name: func createBranch(value: NSNumber, attribute: NSObjectProtocol) -> Self
items.desc: Creates a child node that the decision tree should use when the current node’s attribute has the specified value.

items.name: func createBranch(predicate: NSPredicate, attribute: NSObjectProtocol) -> Self
items.desc: Creates a child node that the decision tree should use when the current node’s attribute satisfies the specified predicate.

items.name: func createBranch(weight: Int, attribute: NSObjectProtocol) -> Self
items.desc: Creates a child node that the decision tree should use as the result of a random choice, biased by the specified weight.
